Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener
    Class controller mitigates information from the UserInput, EventModel, and OutputFrame Class uses Observer Pattern. Listener from UserInputFrame.

        Returns:
        true if there is an event that is already scheduled at the specified time and date
